column2: although I appreciate art from antiquities
column3: I trend toward the beginning of the modern movement (I just don't get excited about most pieces prior to the Belle Epoque)
column4: so most of my review is based on the time I spent in these galleries. That said
column5: I was delighted to find myself in hallways lined with Degas
column7: suites filled with Monet/Renoir/Van Gogh (all of your ART/101 studies will come back to you as you are guaranteed to recognize numerous iconic pieces from these artists along these walls)
column10: Seurat. Although I stated I don't normally get excited for ancient artifacts
column13: and quantity of Eastern religious iconic art.
